programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone is enjoying playing games on Toy Green but when Noddy and Big Ears come back from apple picking at the farm they discover someone, or something, has broken a key on the xylophone bridge. Noddy needs to investigate! With the help of Bumpy and Revs and using the wwwbook to gather clues, Noddy discovers that someone has tried to fix it with purple sticky tape. If he can find out who uses purple sticky tape he might discover who broke the key. The trail leads him to Smartysaurus, who broke the bridge by mistake when she was playing bowling. Noddy and Deltoid show the big dinosaur how to play the game without breaking anything else. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. programme.title: Zoom in
programme.desc: A TV news magazine show packed with top stories from around the world. The weekly program zooms in on the details of trending news items and zooms out to give viewers the bigger picture. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own – Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Legend of the Boneknapper
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang join Gobber on a quest to find a legendary boneknapper dragon.

programme.title: Gift of the Night Fury
programme.desc: As the village of Berk prepares for its winter holiday, the resident dragons all inexplicably fly away.

programme.title: Book of Dragons
programme.desc: Join Hiccup and his friends as they explore and add to their primary reference about dragons.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dragon Racers
programme.desc: The "How to Train Your Dragon" adventure continues when a hunt for lost sheep turns into a fierce, fun-filled competition.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.desc: Oh cannot keep a secret when Tip tells him she's planning a surprise party/Lucy's “Queen of Thighs” video goes viral and turns her into a celebrity.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip spies on Oh when he has his first date with a strange Boov named Krunkle./Tip competes against rival Pom Pom Pappernacky in a beauty pageant.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: When Peabody and Sherman take an intelligence test, Peabody can't believe he scores much lower than Sherman and desperately tries to figure out why

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment—to create life!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone is enjoying playing games on Toy Green but when Noddy and Big Ears come back from apple picking at the farm they discover someone, or something, has broken a key on the xylophone bridge. Noddy needs to investigate! With the help of Bumpy and Revs and using the wwwbook to gather clues, Noddy discovers that someone has tried to fix it with purple sticky tape. If he can find out who uses purple sticky tape he might discover who broke the key. The trail leads him to Smartysaurus, who broke the bridge by mistake when she was playing bowling. Noddy and Deltoid show the big dinosaur how to play the game without breaking anything else. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Heroes Chaser and Chewer (aka Tag and Scooch), team up with Flora Fedora (Lady Lydia) to save the town.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Phoebe’s Gratitude Day card flies away before she can give it to Marcus, the Dews try to help her recreate it - perfectly. But they learn that you don't have to be perfect to show your gratitude for someone. / When Athena finds herself a little short-handed at the Fairhaven Summer Fair, her cousin, Reed, comes to help; only to give Athena more problems to fix.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Harper’s ceramic dragon is smashed, the Dews must find all the pieces. But when a piece ends up missing, the Dews work together to create a new piece, hoping no one will notice. / Dylan goes to great lengths to invite his Dew Drop to his soccer game but, in the process, learns that sometimes believing in something is more powerful than seeing something.

Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Iron Squad W

It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The North Atlantic winter is approaching but the stars are aligning for the fellowship of the dig when the swamp reveals more of its secrets, and a trip to Italy provides a new insight into Nolan's cross.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Jordan Jonas (Season 6 winner) challenges three expert builders, Joel van der Loon (Season 7), Callie North (Season 3), and Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 and 5) to build a raft with a shelter.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Callie North (Season 3), Amos Rodriguez (Season 7), and Joel van der Loon (Season 7) built some unique projects during their time on Alone.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: On his 80th birthday Tom builds a teepee, while Nancy plans him a surprise party. Jake runs a mountain lion off the highway during calving season. Paul hauls his trapping shed up a narrow mountain.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team turns their focus back to the mesa and almost immediately gets more evidence of something buried deep within it. And Brandon returns to the ranch with Utah's Attorney General.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Ashley and Anna try to knock Troy off his throne in his own back yard. Daniel's strategy falls to pieces. Leron and Porkchop call in reinforcements. Troy and Pickle risk their lives to hunt in Deadwood.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: Rene shows up in Orange, declaring himself the King, as Dusty isn't quite ready to concede the title. Meanwhile, Kenny accidentally re-invents the wheel and Lisa sees things from a different perspective.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: In Victorville, a friendly duel runs Dusty up, but his mother lode of vinyl might just save him. Ivy's locker shines some light on the business.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Jordan Jonas (Season 6 winner) challenges three expert builders, Joel van der Loon (Season 7), Callie North (Season 3), and Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 and 5) to build a raft with a shelter.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Callie North (Season 3), Amos Rodriguez (Season 7), and Joel van der Loon (Season 7) built some unique projects during their time on Alone.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team turns their focus back to the mesa and almost immediately gets more evidence of something buried deep within it. And Brandon returns to the ranch with Utah's Attorney General.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten pyramid sites, from a valley in Peru with over 250 hidden pyramids to an ancient Greek city with 4800-year-old ruins to Egypt's famous Giza Plateau.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The North Atlantic winter is approaching but the stars are aligning for the fellowship of the dig when the swamp reveals more of its secrets, and a trip to Italy provides a new insight into Nolan's cross.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: High school friends see an alternative to fast food with the "submarine" sandwich. But they are met with the fierce competition of a new submarine joint that is trying to perfect the art of the franchise.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)
programme.desc: Andy and Paul return to Bradshaw Ranch in Sedona, Arizona in search of a rumoured secret military base, and find themselves in a situation that could jeopardise the entire Beyond Skinwalker mission.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny (S1)
programme.desc: What lies beneath? David Duchovny takes us into the top-secret government bases and the clandestine operations they were built to conceal. Discover a deadly poison lab, a nuclear missile site and more.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a Chinese curse that turns out to be real to human remains in a Founding Father's basement. We uncover some of the world's most dangerous and deadly accidental discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: While new discoveries across the island continue to invigorate the team, a dangerous storm threatens to shut down the entire operation.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: As the team makes contact with the elusive tunnel under the Garden Shaft, an exciting new scientific theory surfaces which suggests a connection between Nolan's Cross and the Knights Templar.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In a Forged in Fire first, bladesmiths head to historic Mystic Seaport for a nautical-themed competition. After a round of coal forging, two travel back to their home forges to recreate a maritime tool.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Noel Juico, 16 Batang Kriminal
programme.desc: Noel (Raymart Santiago) tries to stay out of trouble. But trouble seems to follow him anyway. Can Noel disentangle himself from the dangerous web he himself created?

programme.title: Eagle Squad (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eight young men of different convictions, lifestyles and outlook in life banded together to become the Eagle Squad, an elite group of secret marshalls formed to counteract criminal elements in the city.

programme.title: Tgis, The Movie
programme.desc: The top-rating TV show about teen-age life came to the screen in this adventure film where the TGIS kids learned the value of friendship.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matinik Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Irosin, Pagputok Ng Araw... Babaha ng Dugo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo portrays P/Capt. Antonio Dy, Station Commander of Irosin, Sorsogon. Dy is a recipient of the Medal of Valor from Pres. Cory Aquino for defending the municipal hall from armed NPA rebels.

programme.title: Berdugo (Gabriel Lorenzo)
programme.desc: He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate frames him up and massacres his family.

programme.title: Brown Ninja
programme.desc: Jun (Dante Varona) barely survives a massacre that wipes out his whole family. He was found by a blind, old man in the woods and is nursed back to health. The old man also teaches him the secrets of being a ninja. Jun makes use of his new skills to find his family's killers and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Kadenang Bulaklak
programme.desc: Three little girls were given up for adoption after their parents were killed in an accident. Vina, the oldest sister, was left behind with an aunt. She vowed that one day, she would find all her sisters and reunite her family.

programme.title: Paano Ang Kahapon... Kung Wala Na Ang Ngayon
programme.desc: Two hearts so much apart of one found love "Verbotten" in a world not of their own creation. For they met too early for destiny, too late for happiness.

programme.title: Nagasaki: 188 Memories of the Bomb
programme.desc: Some 76 years after the atomic bomb was unleashed on the city of Nagasaki, NHK and the Nagasaki Atomic Bomb Museum asked survivors to create pictures, preserving their memories for future generations.

programme.title: NHK WORLD TV Special program
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week: cool R&B-rooted J-pop from girl duo Natsudaidai; and EDM-influenced rock from THE SIXTH LIE. Both acts are in the J-MELO studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-18.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at the significance of cats in Japan.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: In Tokyo's romantic Kagurazaka district, watch Noh rehearsals with a kitty named Torakichi. Then, follow an alley cat to a popular coffee shop before enjoying geisha shamisen performances after dark.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: Shizuoka has everything from beaches to mountains, but this time our road takes us through its deep forests, from wild rides on timber trails to a wild taste experience in the birthplace of wasabi.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 8
programme.desc: Filling in as a karate instructor, Michael disrupts the Zen of his student with skills that literally lift him off the ground, and at a toy store, Michael's frog necklace is so fashionably realistic that it has one little girl begging for a new pet. Then at a military outfitting store, Michael and an employee put together a clothing display that puts the "man" in mannequin.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 9
programme.desc: Michael works at a camping store where his life-saving s'mores and pop-up coolers stun would-be glampers, and later at a health food store, a child safety pill bottle with built-in invisibility proves too complicated for adults. Then, at variety store, a customer goes off the rails when Michael adjusts the size of a model train.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 10
programme.desc: Michael befuddles a hardware store patron with a collapsible spray paint can, and cuts a costume shop employee down to size when he shrinks into a leprechaun outfit. Later, a museum employee makes the discovery of a lifetime when a preserved egg hatches a baby dinosaur.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 11
programme.desc: Tonight, Michael tries to pull a fast one on burger joint patrons with his inflatable hot dogs and his unusual technique for bagging buns. Then he creeps out a flea market vendor when he brings an acrylic encased arachnid back to life, and later his co-worker doesn't give a hoot about her job at the camping store when an owl takes over their display.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 12
programme.desc: Michael hits the jackpot at a convenience store and amazes a mother when he demonstrates her child's genius abilities at a toy store. Later, MIchael astonishes his Japanese restaurant co-worker with a set-up that really takes the cake.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 13
programme.desc: Michael leaves a co-worker out to dry at the garden center with a technologically confounding hose that wirelessly transmits water. Later, at the dog groomers, Michael's puppy takes to the catwalk after dressing himself in the most fashionable canine attire.

programme.title: Smallville S1 10
programme.desc: A teenage girl, Amy Palmer, lets her obsession with Lex become life threatening as attacks in the Luthor mansion pit Clark against an invisible enemy.

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood stars as San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan better known as "Dirty Harry" because of the tough way he pursues criminals in this bare-knuckled action film. Investigating the assassinations of crime bosses, Dirty Harry discovers the killers are police who, frustrated by the judicial system, have vowed to rid the city of crime by any means--even killing fellow police officers.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 14
programme.desc: The President contemplates commuting a federal sentence.

programme.title: Friends S5 9
programme.desc: Ross becomes upset when someone at work takes his sandwich from the refrigerator and eats it. Joey finds himself in a terrible mess when he tries to cover for Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Friends S5 10
programme.desc: Phoebe collects money for the Salvation Army during the holidays. A bored Ross creates havoc in Joey and Chandler's lives. Rachel is disturbed by her date's inappropriate relationship with his sister.

programme.title: Friends S5 11
programme.desc: The friends all make New Year's resolutions, but it looks like Rachel's resolution – to stop gossiping – is going to be the hardest to keep when she finds out about Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Friends S5 12
programme.desc: Chandler's behavior toward his boss annoys Monica. Ross' latest romance astounds everyone.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 14
programme.desc: The President contemplates commuting a federal sentence.

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Firefighter Gordon Brewer, is done putting out fires and ready to start one of his own. When his wife and child are horrifically killed in an international terrorist bombing -- linked to Claudio "The Wolf" Perrini -- the CIA and FBI offer no answers and no response. With the official investigation going nowhere, and haunted by the thought of his family's killer walking away scot-free, Gordon swears revenge, even if it takes him to Colombia.

programme.title: Smallville S1 10
programme.desc: A teenage girl, Amy Palmer, lets her obsession with Lex become life threatening as attacks in the Luthor mansion pit Clark against an invisible enemy.

programme.title: Friends S5 13
programme.desc: Phoebe meets her father at her grandmother's funeral. Chandler discovers that Monica gives bad massages. Rachel dresses Joey for an audition. complete with a man's shoulder bag.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 13
programme.desc: Leonard's car is stolen when the guys take a road trip to a comic book convention in Bakersfield, dressed as Star Trek characters.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 14
programme.desc: Outraged that he’s being forced to work with university nemesis, Barry Kripke, Sheldon faces a crisis of conscience. Howard and Raj spend a thousand dollars on action figures of themselves.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 15
programme.desc: A fight between Leonard and Sheldon drives Leonard to finally move in with Penny – not realizing how the shift will affect Penny and Amy’s living arrangements.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 16
programme.desc: While the guys try to give their significant others the perfect Valentine’s Day, Raj and Stuart throw a lonely people party at the comic book store.

programme.title: Arrow S2 20
programme.desc: Oliver and the team return to the lair and find Slade waiting for them. An epic battle breaks out and Oliver is faced with a choice - his battle with Slade or his family.

programme.title: Arrow S2 21
programme.desc: After the Mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city, Oliver realizes it's taken over completely, and he must figure out a way to stop him.

programme.title: Arrow S2 22
programme.desc: After Slade threatens to take away everything Oliver loves, Oliver decides the fastest way to stop further bloodshed is to surrender - an option that will lead to his death.

programme.title: Arrow S2 23
programme.desc: As Slade's soldiers attack the city, Oliver rallies his team and Felicity gets a call from S.T.A.R. Labs with game-changing news. Thea comes face to face with Malcolm Merlyn.

programme.title: Arrow S2 24
programme.desc: In the Season Two Finale, Oliver must decide once and for all whether he's a killer or a hero when Slade moves forward with his plan to kill one more person in Oliver's life.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 01
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Michael poses as a hipster at a farmers market and makes an endless supply of juice. Then things become blurry at the eye doctor, and later, shape shifting aliens send Michael's co-worker into a frenzy.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 02
programme.desc: Michael astounds dental patients with molar radio transmissions, and while appraising art, he brings an extinct species back to life. Plus, an unusual brew stirs a ghostly hallucination that will make jaws drop.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 1
programme.desc: At the port of Los Angeles, Uzi and Shlomi are out to destroy the competition. First, Uzi drives prices through the roof, causing complete chaos on the auction floor. Then, Shlomi plays a hunch on a mysterious container from China that has everyonein a tizzy. Will their strategy pay off?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 1
programme.desc: Contestants from all walks of life compete for glory and $25,000 cash in an arena unlike any other.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 15
programme.desc: Brooke meets a dominatrix who wants to teach a pomegranate a lesson, and Mack and Jack try to help a new couple beat the cohabitation curse. Plus, Kevin and Brooke test a hack that puts your baby to work.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 2
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q get ballsy while posing as salesmen, and then try to outdo each other as they invade the personal space of confused strangers. And tonight's loser is up against the ropes, playing dress-up for an unruly arena.

programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.desc: A TV news magazine show packed with top stories from around the world. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Paper Man

programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.desc: Joshua Aide, a former Marine, is on trial for the murder of his ex-girlfriend's father, as well as her attempted murder and that of a family friend. He claims he was ambushed by the three.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: A love triangle at the University of Florida results in the murder of a popular student. An undeniable digital trail leads straight to his murderer.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A man is gunned down outside a local shop and authorities interrogate two of his acquaintances to find out which one of them pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Savannah and Trent Paschal seem like the perfect suburban couple — madly in love. But when Savannah finds her calling as a funeral director, their romance ends in suspicion, and a countrywide police hunt.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Nacole Smith is brutally murdered in 1995 on a wooded path in Atlanta, the police and community rally around her mother as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Felix persuades Lounis to start dating. Flavie is invited to her aunt's in San Francisco but Ian isn't sure about letting her go on her own.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: In the early morning, Gaspard Watson suddenly arrives at Clarissa's, completely disoriented and covered in blood that is visibly not his own. His last memory is of having left the police station the day before, and thereafter nothing: a total blackout.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: As Jackson manages to piece together Gaspard's actions during the course of the previous evening, he discovers that he'd been in the company of a woman who has since disappeared. Did Gaspard commit a crime, or is someone trying to frame him?

programme.title: Carbone
programme.desc: We are all worried about the climate, but we're still not doing enough to solve the problem. Is our psychology acting as a brake on climate action?

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: Vietnam has a long history with the French language. When the French withdrew in 1954, the spoken language gradually declined, but today it is seeing a revival throughout the country. Here is the story of Francophonie past and present, from the historic French districts of Hanoi to the Mekong delta.

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: Marie-Pierre Lissoir is an ethnomusicologist and researcher at the Traditional Arts and Ethnology Centre. On foot or by tuk-tuk, she shows Adrien her daily life in Luang Prabang, on the banks of the Mekong. From the splendor of Buddhist temples to animist ceremonies, a journey between contemplation and meditation.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Carte Aux Tresors
programme.desc: Heading for the Perigord Noir. The game stretches from the Dordogne and Vezere valleys from Lascaux to Biron via Limeuil, Sarlat and La Roque-Gageac. Contestants: Noemie and Antoine.

programme.title: echappees Belles
programme.desc: On top of their oil reserves and destination as a chic destination, the United Arab Emirates are genuinely interesting from a tourism perspective, mainly due to their surprising contrasts: mountains, deserts, beaches, oases, avant-garde buildings, traditional picturesque markets... The 21st century blends with ancient history and sometimes unsettles tourists.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs !
programme.desc: The eight cooks compete to produce a winning dish of fried quail with appropriate accompaniments. During the challenge, some of them will also have to present a fried onion starter whilst the others will be preparing apple fritters.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites
programme.desc: The aim of the Debout en Bouts association is to raise awareness of the inequity of the financial cost of prostheses, to bring about changes in legislation and to enable the funding of such equipment and support for amputees. With Matthieu Lartot, Brahim Asloum, Jerome Fernandez, Vincent Clerc, emilie Andeol, Sarah Ourahmoune, Jean-Baptiste Marteau.

programme.title: Corporate
programme.desc: emilie Tesson-Hansen, a young and brilliant HRD, is recruited to sack the aging managers of a big company. But when one of them commits suicide, the police start investigating and emilie finds herself in the firing line.

programme.title: Nature Morte
programme.desc: Juliette, a policeman, joins her father Rimbaud, a farmer, in a field. One of his cows has been killed and butchered in the night. The young woman will lead the investigation.

programme.title: Pachyderme
programme.desc: This year, as every year, Louise is left with her grandparents for a short holiday in the country. But this year turns out to be very different, it snows and a monster is about to die.

programme.title: Planete Rap
programme.desc: Ably-hosted by Fred Musa on Skyrock, ''Planete Rap'' sets the standard when it comes to rap programmes in France. Thanks to an innovative, fully-optimised system, discover the television adaptation of the radio format that regularly attracts hundreds of thousands of listeners!

programme.title: Fort Boyard 2024, Toujours Plus Fort !
programme.desc: With Matthieu Lartot, Brahim Asloum, Jerome Fernandez, Vincent Clerc, emilie Andeol, Sarah Ourahmoune, Jean-Baptiste Marteau, for the Debout en Bouts association.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Le Conseil Constitutionnel En Temps De Presidentielle
programme.desc: An immersive visit to the very heart of the Palais-Royal, Paris. The Constitutional Council, prestigious French institution, opens its doors to Serge Moati's cameras at a crucial moment in republican life: the presidential election. True stories, little-known anecdotes, archive footage, personal accounts... A look back at the Council's greatest moments.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Maurice Chevalier, Un Canotier A Hollywood
programme.desc: A legendary French singer and also an actor, dancer and comic, Maurice Chevalier (1888-1972) became a Hollywood star through films of Ernst Lubitsch, Billy Wilder and Vincente Minnelli, his Menilmontant accent and famous straw hat perfectly capturing the spirit of French irreverence. This is his portrait.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: After leaving the Cornavòsa mountain hut, the hikers confront the icy knife-edge ridges of the Via Idra, before reaching the Borgna refuge. It's then time to confront their final peak and take a moment to look back on the most unforgettable moments of their breathtaking trek.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Hj Lim, Le Son Du Silence
programme.desc: A virtuoso pianist, Lim Hyun Jung revisits some of the places from her life: the family home in Anyang, Korea, Paris's prestigious Conservatoire National Superieur de Musique et de Danse, the church in Compiegne and the Baeknyeong Buddhist temple, discussing her loves, her sorrows, her doubts and her successes...

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade
programme.desc: Sea-lover, Philippe is also president of the association Le Clown en Choeur whose members perform in hospitals. During his trip to Granville, Clemence Castel offers him an opportunity to allow his emotions to get the upper hand.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Captain Man loses his powers of invulnerability, he becomes too afraid to fight crime. It is up to Kid Danger to keep Swellview safe and figure out how to restore Captain Man's powers.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: To save his brothers, Mikey needs the help of Bishop's intern, ROD. But Rod wants something in return... to be turned into a MUTANT! To save the day, Mikey has to become... RESPONSIBLE.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: Lost in the West Part 2

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream, but he'll have to get to the store if he wants to use it! // Krabs buys Squidward's art, but to make a profit on his purchase he'll have to get the artist out of the picture!

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League

programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf is rescued by Lily and Blizzard. He'd also like a dragon friend to protect him. // Chef Smurf has accidentally brought an old cauldron back to life and it wants revenge for having been abandoned.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 6
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and glory.
